title: Relief for Visma: No Fracture for Vingegaard After Crash, Jorgenson Back in Paris-Nice Yellow
content:
Two-time Tour de France winner grimaced in pain at the finish line but has apparently avoided more serious injuries: 'Our medical staff will decide tomorrow if he is fit enough to continue the race.'

Read the full article at Relief for Visma: No Fracture for Vingegaard After Crash, Jorgenson Back in Paris-Nice Yellow on Velo.
author: ahood
